Title: Relates to designating crimes against public protection professionals
Summary: Enacts the Lieutenant Alison Russo-Elling crimes against public protection professionals act; designates certain crimes against public protection professionals; enhances penalties.
LawCode: Add Part 4 Title Y-3 Art 497 §§497.00 - 497.15, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to enacting the "Lieutenant Alison Russo-Elling crimes against public protection professionals act"
